sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of DuPont ( DD ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.9%.
Year to date, DuPont registers a 1.5% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Pfizer ( PFE ), trading down 1.3%.
Pfizer is showing a gain of 3.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 1.0%, and Intel Corp ( INTC ), trading up 0.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
